law.text: The facilities division shall be headed by a director experienced in the administration of real property. The division may make contracts, acquire real and personal property by gift, purchase, or by condemnation in the manner prescribed in the Eminent Domain Act of Kentucky, and may do all things necessary to perform its duties under this section and KRS 36.080.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 16. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2711a-128, 4618-84.
